TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicketConverter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class PrintTicketConverter Implements IDisposable
public ref class PrintTicketConverter sealed : IDisposable

Docs.summary: Converts managed objects to unmanaged Graphics Device Interface (GDI) DEVMODE structures, and vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks None of the methods of this class will validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

Docs.summary: Converts the specified DEVMODE structure to a managed code .

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](/windows/win32/api/wingdi/ns-wingdi-devmodea).
The scope of the returned <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> is the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The scope of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> parameter must be the entire print job.
This method does not validate the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>. To validate it, use <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>.
For more information on the DEVMODE structure, see [DEVMODE](/windows/win32/api/wingdi/ns-wingdi-devmodea).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>. The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> in an unusable state. After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> was occupying.
For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).
> [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter> object's `Finalize` method.
